About Text:
Enthusiastic and a passionate lawyer in making, currently in my fourth year pursuing a Five-Year course of BLS LLB from the prestigious Government Law College, Mumbai, highly interested in Disputes, Real Estate and Intellectual Property Rights.

Also a Professional Cinematographer who specialises in Aftermovies, Advertisement, Products and Music Videos. My clients range from Myntra, Jack Daniels, Johnnie Walker and I've worked with the likes of Martin Garrix, Post Malone, DJ Snake, Backstreet Boys, Soha Ali Khan, Ravi Shastri and many more.

Experience Data.title: Legal Intern
Experience Data.description: Real Estate • Litigation • Transactions • Due Diligence • Successions • Estate Planning • Media & Entertainment •Trademark Infringement • Copyright • Company Law • Insolvency & Bankruptcy

Skills: Intellectual Property Law, Dispute Resolution, Corporate Law, Media & Entertainment Law, Trademark, Copyright, Legal Research, Legal Writing, Litigation
